vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
περιτομ-ή, ἡ,
circumcision, [LXX+2nd c.BC+]
__II section of a machine, ἡ κάτω π. [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__III circular incision, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: circumcision; figuratively, the Jews (as a group of people who adhered to the ritual of circumcision)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
circumcision; figuratively, the Jews (as a group of people who adhered to the ritual of circumcision)
circumcision, the act, or custom of circumcision, Jn. 7:22, 23; Acts 7:8; the state of being circumcised, the being circumcised, Rom. 2:25, 26, 27; 4:10; metonomy the circumcision, those who are circumcised, Rom. 3:30; 4:9 metaphorically spiritual circumcision of the heart and affection, Rom. 2:29; Col. 2:11; metonymy persons spiritually circumcised, Phil. 3:3
vocabInfos._es_Definition: circuncisión (como un rito religioso) ; los que son circuncidados, judíos ; judío
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 割禮
1a)文化儀式
1b)已受割禮的狀態
1c)(喻意)屬靈的割禮
2) 受割禮的人
2a)字意上的
2b)喻意上的
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 割礼
1a)文化仪式
1b)已受割礼的状态
1c)(喻意)属灵的割礼
2) 受割礼的人
2a)字意上的
2b)喻意上的
